mapper.select: SELECT gsn.`notify_id`, ggs.`sales_type`, ggs.`sales_name`, gsn.`nick_name`, gsn.`mobile`, gsn.is_notify FROM goods.`gs_sales_notify` gsn LEFT JOIN goods.`gs_goods_sales` ggs ON gsn.`sales_id` = ggs.`sales_id`
mapper.update: UPDATE goods.`gs_sales_notify` SET is_notify='1' WHERE notify_id=#{notifyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
